text:
@realDonaldTrump You have more important things to do than play with your phone.
COVID-19 is spreading like wildfire and no one believes your bullshit.

Get off your ass and MANDATE MASKS !!

Then get PPE for all the hospitals !!

NOW CALL DR. FAUCI AND ASK HIM WHAT YOU SHOULD DO NEXT !!!

GO !!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
